{"id":887376873,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1674984275,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/887376873/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"42.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean validPalindrome(String s) {\n        \n        return isValid(0,s.length()-1,s,true);\n\n    }\n\n    private boolean isValid(int i, int j, String s, boolean isAvailable){\n        \n        while(i < j){\n\n            if( s.charAt(i) != s.charAt(j) ){\n                if(isAvailable) {\n                    isAvailable = false;\n\n                    if(i == j-1) return true;\n\n                    if( s.charAt(i+1) == s.charAt(j)){\n                        return isValid(i+1, j, s, false) || \n                                isValid(i,j-1,s,false);\n                    }\n                    else if( s.charAt(i) == s.charAt(j-1) ){\n                        return isValid(i,j-1,s,false) ||\n                                isValid(i+1,j,s,false);\n                    }\n                    else{\n                        return false;\n                    }\n\n                }\n                else{\n                    return false;\n                }\n\n\n            }\n            else{\n                i++;\n                j--;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return !(i<j);\n    }\n\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false}
